entry.title: About Me
entry.content:
Welcome To Xue Li’s Website!

Hello! I’m Xue Li, and you may call me Liv as well. With a background in Astrophysics and Cosmology, I’ve explored the mysteries of the universe. After securing an academic position as an Assistant Professor, I made a pivotal decision to embark on a new adventure - the world of data science. Now, I’m harnessing the power of data to uncover insights and drive innovation, blending the analytical skills and innovative thinking I honed during my academic journey with the boundless possibilities that data science offers. Yes! I am fascinated by the art of decoding everything with data!

I’d love to connect with you. Feel free to reach out to me at lixue.liv@outlook.com.

My Analytical Skills

I’m passionate about using data to solve real-world problems and drive innovation.

  • Proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, Matlab, IDL, SQL, R, and more.
  • Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence.
  • Data Collection and Analysis.
  • Data Modeling.
  • Data Visualization.
  • Mathematical Methods: Probability and Statistics, Geometry, Mathematical Methods of Physics, Differential Geometry, Numerical Recipes, Signal Processing and Analysis, and more.
  • Professional Certifications: TensorFlow, Azure, and Microsoft Power Platform.
  • Learning Apache Spark.
  • Strong analytical thinking and innovation.

Explore More About Me

Discover various facets of my professional journey and interests:

  • Data Science: Delve into my data science expertise, projects, and skills.
  • Data-Driven Projects: Explore in-depth information about my data-driven projects.
  • Astrophysics and Cosmology: Explore my academic background and research experiences in astrophysics and cosmology.
  • Publications: Access a list of my academic publications, research papers, and writings.
  • Conferences and Talks: Learn about my contributions to conferences and talks.
  • More About Me: Get to know me on a personal level, including hobbies, interests, and experiences beyond my professional journey.
